title: 02/02/22 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 02/02/22 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio talks about the Brian Flores allegations and lawsuit. Mike says the allegation about being paid to lose is serious and should be investigated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
